arm_group.description: Electric acupuncture,Chinese medicine,Chinese medicine cupping,rehabilitation,To treat five times a week,Total course is eight weeks
rehabilitation,To treat five times a week,Total course is eight weeks

brief_summary.textblock:
Shoulder-hand syndrome，a common complication of stroke patient，which is an important factor
      of limb function recovery.This research aims to observe the effect and safety of Acupuncture
      and Traditional Chinese medicine Combined with Rehabilitation Therapy for Post-stroke
      Shoulder-hand Syndrome.Furthermore, the investigators will promote the treatment in
      community hospital.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        - Ischemic stroke and shoulder hand syndrome,conscious,For 2 weeks to 6 months,Patients
        with I or Ⅱ period.

        Exclusion Criteria:

        - Disturbance of consciousness,With shoulder joint disease or muscle disease,Patients with
        shoulder hand syndrome Ⅲ period,Serious primary diseases such as heart,liver and
        kidney,Mental illness.

intervention.description: rehabilitation,To treat five times a week,Total course is eight weeks

clinical_study.official_title: Acupuncture and Traditional Chinese Medicine Combined With Rehabilitation Therapy for Post-stroke Shoulder-hand Syndrome in Community Hospital: a Multicenter，Randomized，Controlled Trial

other_outcome.description: To evaluate patient's ability in daily life

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the pain in shoulder joint
primary_outcome.measure: Visual analogue scale (VAS) method Visual analogue scale (VAS) method Visual analogue scale (VAS)

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the limb movement function
